meanings.definition: Not fastened or secured with rivets.
meanings.sent1: The loose panel was unrivetted and wobbled when touched.
meanings.sent2: The unrivetted door swung open with a gentle push.
meanings.sent3: The unrivetted chair seemed to have a mind of its own, sliding across the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her unrivetted thoughts wandered freely, unconstrained by logic.
meanings.sent5: The unrivetted connection between them was fragile, easily broken.

meanings.definition: Not fixed or held in place.
meanings.sent1: The unrivetted bookshelf threatened to collapse at any moment.
meanings.sent2: His unrivetted gaze wandered around the room, never settling on one thing.
meanings.sent3: The unrivetted hat kept slipping down over his eyes, causing him to bump into things.
meanings.sent4: The unrivetted relationship between the two countries was unstable and unpredictable.
meanings.sent5: The unrivetted rope swung back and forth, dangling precariously over the edge.

meanings.sent1: Her unrivetted imagination knew no bounds, creating fantastical worlds in her mind.
meanings.sent2: The unrivetted river meandered freely through the valley, unrestricted by man-made barriers.
meanings.sent3: The unrivetted puppy ran around the yard in circles, full of boundless energy.
meanings.sent4: His unrivetted spirit soared high above the mundane concerns of everyday life.
meanings.sent5: The unrivetted possibilities stretched out before her, endless and exciting.
